devdoc.details: Contract responsible for creating new instances of SmartLoans (SmartLoanDiamondBeacon). It's possible to either simply create a new loan or create and fund it with an ERC20 asset as well as borrow in a single transaction. At the time of creating a loan, SmartLoansFactory contract is the owner for the sake of being able to perform the fund() and borrow() operations. At the end of the createAndFundLoan the ownership is transferred to the msg.sender. It's also responsible for keeping track of the loans, ensuring one loan per wallet rule, ownership transfers proposals/execution and authorizes registered loans to borrow from lending pools.

SmartLoanCreated(address,address,bytes32.details: emitted after creating a loan by the owner

params.collateralAmount: amount of asset used as initial collateral*
params.creator: account creating a SmartLoanDiamondBeacon

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: SmartLoansFactory
